note: Remember to install 0.9.0 version of pm2-meteor with: npm i -g pm2-meteor. Then use rm -rf node_modules; npm install --production; pm2-meteor generateBundle; Copy with scp to server to apps_running/<app name>/ scp bundle.tar.gz digital_ocean@178.128.229.73:/home/digital_ocean/apps_running/botigo/ . Then in the server cd apps_running/<app name>; tar -xzf bundle.tar.gz; cd bundle/programs/server/; npm install, cd ../../../; pm2 start pm2-env.json
